sect1.title: Executing the program
sect1.para: Once your executable is ready after the build, you can execute it by choosing the menu item BuildExecute, or pressing F3. You can specify which executable you want to use in case your project provides more than one and specify command line arguments.

note.title: Dependencies
note.para: Unlike the build stage, execution doesn't check for dependencies (at least for the time being). In other words, it does not check if the executable is up-to-date before it executes the program. So, you must take care of that yourself.
